text: Nicholas "Nick" Baird (born 11 January 1955) is a British auto racing driver. ==Career== He competed in the British Sports 2000 Championship between 1986 and 1988, winning the best newcomer award in his debut season. In 1988, he finished second overall, winning his class. For 1989, he competed in the British Sportscar Championship. In 1990, he stepped up to the British Touring Car Championship, driving a BMW 318is he finished 22nd overall.Official 1990 BTCC standings He returned for a second season in 1991, driving for Tech- Speed Motorsport he finished 21st with two championship points. ==References== ==External links== *Nick Baird at BTCC Pages Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:British Touring Car Championship drivers
title: Nick Baird (racing driver)
